description:
Main source of livelihood

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
The data are based on the respondents self-assessments. As
a consequence, 'employment' may be indicated as the main
source of livelihood although, by definition, a person is
not regarded as being in employment while there still are
ties with an employer. This is the case, for example, with
people who are on parental leave, (special) leave etc.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Main source of livelihood
